nodes.message: Esme Wolf joins fight is reputation high enough
Hide smaller proaches - Restored when re-entering the scene.

nodes.text: Oh wow... That's one big bug!
It's still here... Oh man.
Maybe I can just sneak past...
Hey, I've got this far and it hasn't noticed me. Maybe I can blindside his ugly bugly?

options.text: Use Flash Powder on the Creature

nodes.text: Hey! Big Bug! I'm over here!
Take a look at this!
All right! I've blinded it!
Um... now what?
Hmmm there's some sort of jewelry on this guy.
Got it!
Ack, this thing is stuck. I can't cut the necklace loose. The bug's about to see again.
Got it!
I'm just not nimble enough to slip the jewelry off quickly.
On second thought. Maybe this is not such a good idea.

options.text: Use Sleeping Powder on the Creature

nodes.text: Huh, that didn't do anything? Don't these guys breathe?
Well. that would be a great idea if I had anything I could use to dazzle this deadly insect.
Uh oh!
All right, let's squash this big bug.
Uh oh!
When in doubt - run!
*** Gulp ***
Woof! Woof!
Grrrrrr!!!
Uh... good girl! Together we can make mincemeat out of this thing!
Not that I'd eat it...
All right, I guess it's just you and me, you ugly little cockroach!
That's it, I'm out of here...
